question: What is the average number of days between booking and flight departure for international flights?
query:
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(epoch FROM (f.scheduled_departure - b.update_ts)) / 86400) AS average_days
FROM postgres_air.booking AS b
JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg AS bl ON b.booking_id = bl.booking_id
JOIN postgres_air.flight AS f ON bl.flight_id = f.flight_id
JOIN postgres_air.airport AS da ON f.departure_airport = da.airport_code
JOIN postgres_air.airport AS aa ON f.arrival_airport = aa.airport_code
WHERE da.iso_country <> aa.iso_country;
